about.title: About Us
about.description: TRICYCLE PRODUCTOS SL is a company specialized in recycling and recovery of plastics, metals, and papers. We contribute to a more sustainable future through effective recycling solutions.
about.missionText: To transform waste into valuable resources, promoting the circular economy and minimizing environmental impact.

plastic.title: Recycled Plastic
plastic.description: We offer different types of high-quality recycled plastics for various industrial applications.

metal.title: Recovered Metal
metal.description: We recover and process metals from various sources to give them a second life.

paper.title: Paper and Cardboard
paper.description: We recycle paper and cardboard to create new products, saving trees, water, and energy.

quality.title: Guaranteed Quality
quality.description: Rigorous quality controls in all our processes and products.

sustainability.title: Sustainable Commitment
sustainability.description: We actively contribute to the circular economy and environmental protection.

experience.title: Experience and Knowledge
experience.description: Years of experience in the recycling sector back us up.

customization.title: Customized Solutions
customization.description: We adapt our products to the specific needs of each client.
